p: With respect to the groundnut crop production, the major cultivating season is found to be the winter, locally known as Margazhi Pattam (December-January). The main varieties grown during this time are TMV 7, VRI-2, ALR3, and CO(gn). During Masi Pattam (February-March), the TMV7, CO-2, and VRI-2 varieties are cultivated; and during summer or Chithirai Pattam (April-May), CO-2, CO-3, and VRI-2 varieties are cultivated.
